scripts.dev: bun run dev:gen-config && wrangler dev --config wrangler.dev.json
scripts.dev:network: bun run dev:gen-config && wrangler dev --config wrangler.dev.json --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.dev:remote: bun run dev:gen-config:remote && wrangler dev --remote --config wrangler.remote.json
scripts.wrangler:state:reset:preview: bun run r2:reset:preview && bun run db:reset:remote && bun run db:migrate:preview
scripts.r2:reset:preview: wrangler r2 bucket delete sitelink-files-preview; wrangler r2 bucket create sitelink-files-preview
scripts.db:tables:local: wrangler d1 execute sitelink-db --local --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:tables:remote: wrangler d1 execute sitelink-db --remote --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:delete-test-user: wrangler d1 execute sitelink-db --local --command "DELETE FROM user WHERE email = 'test2@example.com'"
scripts.test:integration: bun run db:migrate:local && docker compose -f container/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait && vitest run tests/integration/; result=$?; docker compose -f container/docker-compose.yml down; exit $result
scripts.test:integration:no-container: bun run db:migrate:local && vitest run tests/integration/
